text: William Francis NighyBill Nighy â€“ Nighy Accepts Surname Mispronunciation. contactmusic.com. 30 June 2006. Retrieved 10 February 2010. (born 12 December 1949) is an English actor. He starred in the movies Love Actually, Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest and Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End as Davy Jones. During his career, he has won a BAFTA Award and a Golden Globe Award. In 2023, he was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Actor for his role in the movie Living.Bill Nighy receives first Oscar nomination of his career He was partners with actress Diana Quick from 1982 until they separated in 2008. Their daughter is actress Mary Nighy. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Surrey Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:English movie actors Category:English radio actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors
title: Bill Nighy
